# This file is automatically generated. Changes will be overwritten. Do not change this file directly.

| Table | Categories | Solutions|[Supports basic log plan](/azure/azure-monitor/logs/basic-logs-configure?tabs=portal-1#compare-the-basic-and-analytics-log-data-plans)| Queries|
|---|---|---|---|---|
| [AppEnvSessionConsoleLogs](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/AppEnvSessionConsoleLogs)<p>Logs generated by Sessions within a Container App Environment. This includes logs generated on the stdout or stderr streams by all containers in the session. | audit, resources | LogManagement | Yes| -|
| [AppEnvSessionLifecycleLogs](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/AppEnvSessionLifecycleLogs)<p>Logs generated by CustomContainer Session Pool within a Container App Environment. This includes logs produced by session allocation related platform events. | audit, resources | LogManagement | Yes| -|
| [AppEnvSessionPoolEventLogs](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/AppEnvSessionPoolEventLogs)<p>Logs generated by CustomContainer Session Pool within a Container App Environment. This includes logs produced by the Session Pool itself, including pod creation and deletion, etc | audit, resources | LogManagement | Yes| -|
| [AppEnvSpringAppConsoleLogs](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/AppEnvSpringAppConsoleLogs)<p>Logs generated by Spring Apps(Container Apps with managedBy annotation) within a Container App Environment. This includes logs generated on the stdout or stderr streams by all containers in the app. It also includes all Dapr sidecar container logs but does not include any system or platform level logs produced by the Container App Environment itself. | audit, resources | LogManagement | Yes| -|
| [AzureActivity](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/AzureActivity)<p>Entries from the Azure Activity log that provides insight into any subscription-level or management group level events that have occurred in Azure. | resources, audit, security | LogManagement | No| [Yes](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/queries/azureactivity)|
| [ContainerAppConsoleLogs](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/ContainerAppConsoleLogs)<p>Logs generated by Container Apps within a Container App Environment. This includes logs generated on the stdout or stderr streams by all containers in the app. It also includes all Dapr sidecar container logs but does not include any system or platform level logs produced by the Container App Environment itself. | audit, resources | LogManagement | Yes| -|
| [ContainerAppSystemLogs](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/ContainerAppSystemLogs)<p>Platform Logs generated by a Container App Environment. These logs are generated by system components and any underlying infrastructure. Events related to revision management, Dapr, Keda and Envoy can be found here. | audit, resources | LogManagement | No| -|
